attributes.action: guarantee in public and the House of Commons that no European Police Force/ Gendarmerie or equivalent would be allowed to be used in the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If a European police force does not exist, he should be willing to say in both public and the House of Commons that it would not be allowed in the United Kingdom.
If a European Police force does exist he should state both in public and the House of Commons that it would not be allowed in the United Kingdom. Various reasons fo not allowing this are:

Police forces in Europe have military structures with ranks such as Colonel.
Each policeman is armed with military style weapons (automatic rifles etc).
Police in the United Kingdom are a civilian force.
European police forces do not have local policeforces such as Avon and Somerset police but are controlled centrally.
Police Officers are rotated around entire countries and are not able to build up a local knowledge of the area.
European police have a tradition of upholding the authority of the state, UK police are used as law enforcement.
Other reasons include a police force being controlled by the EU rather than the UK parliament.
